msbt.message: Huh? "Outside Service Area"? Guess I can't use the app here.
Call Rescue Service?
Call!
Nope.
Hello!<10_7 arg="45" />Thanks for your call. You've reached the Rescue Service hotline.
Let's see, you are<10_7 arg="30" />
Your current location is<10_7 arg="30" />
Dirt clods! I dunno what's goin' on with this thing! Signal's bouncin' around like crazy

Tell me somethin', pal. You got a visitor? Or maybe ya got the gate open at the airport or somethin'?'Cause here's the deal—ya get too many signals jumbled together, and things don't work so wellIf this is really an emergency-type situation, open the  Button menu, and select End Session, will ya?

Tell me somethin', pal Are you, by chance, off visitin' somebody else's island?'Cause listen up—I get too many signals smackin' into each other, an' things can getmessy.If you're really, truly in a jam, ya gotta select Return to my island on the  Button menu. Got it?

Hold up. Are you, uh, currently inside a building?Hate to break it to ya, bud, but this is one o' those outdoor-only services.Listenya whack your noggin on the ceiling, ya got a major headache, am I right? No one wants that.So ya wanna use this service, ya gotta step outside, capisce?
I got it. This is of , right?
Just gimme a sec... OK! Got it! from over on , right? In a bit of a jam, huh?
Huh? ? Again? Got yourself in another pickle, huh?

Hey, pal. You're a first-time user, right? Let me lay out the nuts and bolts of the service for ya.We're here to help ya out when ya get yourself stuck somewhere. Give us a call, andfaster than you can say "earthworm sandwich," we transport you someplace nice and safe.Revolutionary tech! How's it work? Trade secret, ya nosy noodle! Seriously. Leave it alone.
Fee structure's simple. A single rescue'll cost ya 100 miles That's 100 Nook Miles Whaddaya say?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
It's 100 miles per rescue. Whaddaya say?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
Oh yeah That reminds me. Last time you didn't have enough miles, I hope history ain't repeatin' itselfThe fee is 100 miles a pop. That's 100 Nook Miles. Whaddaya say?
Yes! Help!
No, thanks.
What's that? You're good?
What? You're good? Listen I'm not irked 'bout your previous miles issue Ya know that, right?
If you're in a jam, just say the word!
Ain't got the Nook Miles or somethin' like that? No big deal. We can work somethin' out If you're in a jam, just say the word!
Good call!<10_4 /> Lemme just take those 100 miles up front
Smart thinkin'! <10_4 />Looks like you ain't short on Nook Miles, so lemme just take those 100 miles up front
Good choice! First, lemme just get the 100 miles up front, and<10_7 arg="75" />
<10_10 /> HEY!<10_9 />What's the big idea? Listen, pal. You ain't got the Nook Miles!C'mon! Deep breath, Resetti OK Seeing as this is an emergency, I'll cover ya. No charge!
<10_10 /> HEY!<10_9 />What's goin' on here? You ain't got the Nook Miles! Again!Sheesh! Ain't you a piece of work? OK Seeing as this is an emergency, I'll cover ya. No charge!
Since I'm doin' this outta the kindness of my heart, you'll go where I put ya. Beggars can't be choosers.
One more thing. Since you're not traveling alone, I gotta send ya to the plaza.
Now that that's settled, where can I send ya?
Home.
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
Now that that's settled, where can I send ya?
My tent.
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
Now that that's settled, where can I send ya?
Home.
The plaza.
The shop.
The airport.
Cancel.
By the way, seeing as ya ain't settled on a place to call homeya gotta tell me where we're headed!
The plaza.
The airport.
Cancel.
By the way, seeing as ya ain't settled on a place to call homeya gotta tell me where we're headed!
The plaza.
The shop.

Now that that's settled, where can I send ya?
My tent.
The plaza.
The shop.
The airport.
Cancel.
Huh? Hey, pal You're out and about, ain't ya?I can't get no good map data off that island, so I'm gonna drop ya where the planes land. Ya good with that?
Yes, please!
Cancel.
Hey! You're on one of them maze islands Tom Nook set up, ain't ya?In that case, I'm supposed to drop ya where the planes land so you can start over You good with that?
Yes, please!
Cancel.
Hey! You're on one of them maze islands Tom Nook set up, ain't ya?In that case, I'm supposed to drop ya where the planes land so you can start over!
Your tent? No sweat.
Your place, huh? Easy peasy.
The plaza? You got it!
The ol' island shop, eh? Sure thing!
Gotcha. Buckle up, buttercup. Here we go!
Airport it is! Roger wilco and all that.
Uh Which button was it?
Let's see Huh? This is the right button, ain't it?
Err Dirt clods! I ain't no good with these gizmos
I think this is it. Only one way to find out
RANGERS, GO!<10_8 arg="30" />
Open your eyes, kid! Trip's over!
Oh yeah. One last thing
Islands are like potato sacks. Cram too much into 'em, and they burst!<10_4 /> Moderation's the key, pal.
So ya got "auto-saving," huh? Means ya can't reset things here on .
Results ain't everything.<100_3 arg="Katsu" /> What you put in is what you get out!<10_4 /> This island? Your life? Keep 'em tidy!
Islands are like potato sacks. Cram too much into 'em, and they burst!<10_4 /> Moderation's the key, pal.
So ya got "auto-saving," huh? Means ya can't reset things here on .
So. Nook Miles, right? There are ways to stack 'em up, and it ain't rocket science!To begin with, ya get miles just by accessing the Nook Stop on the daily. Remember that!
Should I start up the Island Designer app and do some construction work?
Start construction!
Request cleanup.
Check the manual.
Nah.
Getting permission for construction<10_8 arg="30" />
The Island Designer app is ready! Remember to wear a helmet during construction, and work safely!
Am I done building for now?
Yeah, I'm done.
Request cleanup.
Check the manual.
Nah, I'll keep going.
Connection error!<10_8 arg="30" />
Is the reception bad or what? Maybe I should stand up and try again.
Is the reception bad, or what? Maybe I should try again when I'm back on land.
You're outside of the valid service area. You can only use this app while outdoors on .
Commencing wrap-up sequence<10_8 arg="60" />
Construction controls terminated! Please feel free to use our services again.
I can't use the Island Designer app when the airport gate is open.
I can't use the Island Designer app when company is visiting the island.
I can't use the Island Designer app when communications are active.I'll need to shut them off at the airport first.
Island Designer is ready!
Use the  Button to switch between different construction options. Please check the manual for info.
Press  or  to switch between construction options when using a horizontal Joy-Con. Please check the manual for info.
App Notification: Waterscaping permit added.
App Notification: Cliff-construction permit added.
App Notification: Waterscaping and cliff-construction permits added.
Press the  Button to switch between options. Check the manual in the app for more information.
You can press  or  to switch between options when using a horizontal Joy-Con. Please check the manual for info.
About the Island Designer AppStarting and Stopping Construction Please use the app to properly begin and end construction.
Switching Between Permits During construction, you can press the  Button to switch permits.
Switching Between Permits When using a horizontal Joy-Con, switch construction permits by... pressing  or .
Please note: Your permits for the Island Designer app are only valid for use on . If you leave the island, construction will end.Always wear a helmet, and always work with safety in mind!
Path Construction Guide Press  while on grassy areas to create or remove paths.
Path Construction Guide Press  while on grassy areas to create or remove paths.
Selecting Path Designs Press the  Button to select from path designs you've obtained.
Selecting Path DesignsWhen using a horizontal Joy-Con, press  or  to select from path designs you've obtained.
Waterscaping Construction GuidePress  to dig into the ground and create new rivers, ponds, etc. You can also fill them in. Creating Waterfalls Try digging atop a cliff to create a waterfall.
Waterscaping Construction GuidePress  to dig into the ground and create new rivers, ponds, etc. You can also fill them in. Creating Waterfalls Try digging atop a cliff to create a waterfall.

Cliff Construction GuidePress  to create cliffs, round the edges of existing cliffs, or destroy existing cliffs. Building Cliffs on Top of Cliffs You can stack cliffs, but not right at the edge. No building giant walls! Start by making a big base with lots of surface area before moving up to the next tier. Destroying Waterfalls First use the waterscaping permit to fill in the waterfall. After that, you can destroy the cliff at will.

Cliff Construction GuidePress  to create cliffs, round the edges of existing cliffs, or destroy existing cliffs. Building Cliffs on Top of Cliffs You can stack cliffs, but not right at the edge. No building giant walls! Start by making a big base with lots of surface area before moving up to the next tier. Destroying Waterfalls First use the waterscaping permit to fill in the waterfall. After that, you can destroy the cliff at will.

Cleanup Service GuideSometimes, when you're working on construction projects, you might accidentally find yourself in a pinch.Perhaps something you put out keeps you from moving around, or you can't grab an item up on a cliff.The cleanup service is for these moments where you need the items around you cleaned up a bit.The cleanup service will only work on placed items, fencing, and trees in your immediate vicinity.Make sure you get close to the items causing you trouble before you apply for the service.Items picked up by the service will be deposited in the recycle box at Resident Services.So don't delay in picking up those items from the box!
What should I read up on?
Basic user guide.
Path construction.
Cleanup service.
I'm done reading.

Sometimes while doing construction, you might find yourself in a little bit of trouble.Perhaps you can't pick up an item placed on top of a cliff.Maybe a decoration in a narrow area is keeping you from moving around.The cleanup service can help by picking up items placed immediately around you.Any cleaned-up items will be placed in the recycle box inside Resident Services.Please check the manual for details.
Use the cleanup service to send items around you to the recycle box?
Yes, clean things up!
No, not right now.
Understood! Please wait as we clean up the items around you.
Cleanup complete! Please note only items and fencing are sent to the recycle box.
We couldn't find anything to clean up.The cleanup service will only work on placed items, fencing, and trees in your immediate vicinity.
You're outside of the valid service area for the cleanup service.This service can only be used outdoors on .
Looks like the map app won't work for this island.
Looks like the map app won't work while I'm swimming...
Hm? It says "Outside service area." Guess I can't use it here.
Looks like I can't use the Chat Log app during Party Play
